EmailTemplate.name: Custom Logo Program Information
EmailTemplate.subject: YETI Custom Logo Program Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We appreciate your interest in the YETI Custom Logo Program! A YETI Cooler with your custom logo applied is the ultimate way to promote, brand, reward, or thank. YETI custom logos are durable, permanent graphics which will not peel or fade once bonded to the cooler.
You can find full details of the custom logo program here: 2016 YETI COOLERS CUSTOM LOGO PROGRAM
Roadie 20 up to the Tundra 65 and Tank 85 are available sizes. Initial minimum order is $10,000 with reorder minimum of $3,000. Logo set-up fee is $1000 for one color logo and $500 per each additional color. Typical lead time is eight weeks.** Vector artwork required.
**Pending product availability.
Please reach out to the YETI Custom Logo Team with any additional questions: customlogo@yeti.com or 512.402.5895. We look forward to working with you through the custom logo process and ultimately providing a one of a kind custom logo YETI Cooler!
Custom Logo Team
YETI
512.402.5895
customlogo@yeti.com
yeti.com
